title: Blind Beggar of Tivoli
marks: Signature and Mark LRC, in engraving: [Austin]
description: old man sitting on stool with back to cliff and village; wearing overcoat loosely draped over shoulders; eyes closed; holding crucifix and rosary in PR hand, PL hand rests in bowl on lap, walking stick resting between legs; on thin paper
creditline: Gift of Robert Austin's daughters, Rachel and Clare
